column3: Can you wait for me? {{c1::I won't}} be long.
I'm glad I'm meeting Emily tomorrow. {{c1::It will}} be good to see her again.
It's no good asking Amy for advice. {{c1::She won't}} know what to do.
I'm sorry about what happened. {{c1::It won't}} happen again.

We don't need to take an umbrella.
I don't think {{c1::it will}} rain.
I've got some incredible news. {{c1::You won't}} believe it.
It's a very nice hotel. {{c1::You'll}} enjoy your stay here.
I can't meet you tomorrow. {{c1::I won't}} have time.
